DOC.detailed_description: Phase III clinical trial , comparative , open , multicenter , prospectively , random inflow 78 patient evaluable male patient erectile dysfunction IIEF-5 score 13 24 , correspond mild mild moderate evaluate efficacy safety well possible superiority express faster onset action onset action study medication .
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year ; Patients erectile dysfunction various etiology ( organic , psychogenic mixed ) least 6 month ; Patients score IIEF5 13 24 , correspond mild mild moderate ; Relationship stable least 6 month ; Patients keep libido ; Education least 4 year ; Do use sildenafil , vardenafil , tadalafil , lodenafil , injection therapy vacuum device 72 hour screen visit ; Functions hepatic , hematological , hormonal renal within follow benchmark : Creatinine : 0.6 1.10 mg / dl ; Urea : 10 50mg/dl ; TGP : 40 U / L ; TGO : ≤ 34 U / L ; Prolactin : 2.3 11.5 ng / ml Men Total Testosterone : 241 827 ng/100 ml Men Blood glucose : 70 mg / dl 99mg/dl . Patients fail treatment inhibitor phosphodiesterase inhibitor ; Patients undergo radical prostatectomy ; Patients hypersensitivity component formula ; Presence genital deformity disorder prevent intercourse ; Operations prior penile erectile dysfunction premature ejaculation penis enlargement ; Use treatment erectile dysfunction concomitant treatment nitrate ; Myocardial infarction cerebrovascular accident ( CVA ) less 6 month ; Heart disease uncontrolled serious ; Injury cord injury ; Multiple sclerosis ; Retinitis pigmentosa ; Neoplasms know business / treatment ; History severe anaphylactic reaction disease StevenJohnson ; Participation clinical study 2 month prior inclusion ; Patients make use antiretrovirals ; Any disease condition match opinion investigator , could lead increase risk patient make inappropriate study ; Comorbidities diabetes mellitus , malignant hypertension , blood pressure ( BP ) , systolic > 170 mmHg , diastolic BP level > 110 mmHg , blood pressure < 80 x 50 mmHg , significant cardiovascular disease , alcohol drug , disorder important .
